The pricing is excellent, with a solid free tier that's perfect for small projects, and the paid plans are very reasonably priced. I've been able to represent my projects in a very professional manner, with easy-to-use features that help me to effectively manage and track my progress.

The community around this tool is also very helpful, with a wealth of education resources available to help you get started and troubleshoot any issues that may arise. As a citizen of the development world, it's great to see a tool that's so focused on helping users succeed. I've been able to find answers to all my questions, and the community is always there to lend a hand.

In terms of performance, I've been impressed with how solid the tool is, even when dealing with large and complex projects. The metrics are easy to track, and I can see exactly where I need to focus my efforts to improve. One area for improvement is the UI, which can be a bit clunky at times - but overall, it's a minor issue and doesn't detract from the overall usefulness of the tool.

I've been able to use this tool to realign my 3rd generation archive, which has been a huge help. I can see exactly what's going on, and make changes as needed. It's been a huge time saver, and I'm very satisfied with the results. If you're in the market for a tool to help with your personal projects, I'd definitely recommend giving this one a try - just be aware that there may be a bit of a learning curve, but it's worth it in the end.
